text.section:
Evaluation of a governmental activity or unit shall be completed:
by an evaluation committee for the Senate, appointed by the President of the Senate, and an evaluation committee for the House of Delegates, appointed by the Speaker of the House; or
by an evaluation committee appointed jointly by the President and Speaker.
Each evaluation committee for a governmental activity or unit shall be appointed on or before May 31 of the year before the evaluation date of that governmental activity or unit.
